Made with bytes*

* made with several bytes before compression. No bytes where harmed during this transmission.

Passionate about web development.

Made with bytes is a UK based company. We love best practices, working with emerging technologies. We are technology agnostic but our favourite flavour is Python.

My name is Alfredo Aguirre and I contract under my own company Made with bytes Ltd.

I love creating and contributing open source projects some of my work can be found in Github, also you can read some of my thoughts in Twitter or in the write-ups section.

I have collaborated with creative agencies and start-ups creating scalable, high-performant, cross-browser, multilingual, social-network integrated online applications, for high profile clients.

My expertise allows me to "hit the ground running", and take an idea from zero to completion, with short turnarounds.

If you have an awesome idea and you need technical expertise to get it done, please get in touch. I can be reached via Twitter, linkedin or email.

A few technologies that we use:

  • python
  • django
  • amazon web services
  • heroku
  • NGINX
  • Apache
  • redis
  • MySQL
  • PostgreSQL
  • SQLAlchemy
  • Vagrant

  • emacs

About.

My name is Alfredo Aguirre and I founded and contract under Made with bytes. I am passionate about it, I love best practices and working with new technologies.

Made with bytes Ltd is a UK based company that provides Web Development and Consultancy. If you are in need of technical expertise you should get in touch!
